long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As a Thelightbulb.ai customer, you can use our Emotion Ai Chrome Extension to do the following for your Google Meet calls/meetings:

1. Send live meeting images to the Lightbulb emotion-recognition engine for engagement analysis automatically. .
2. Transcribe the meeting and map it to positive and negative emotions expressed by participants during the meeting, accompanied by timestamps & speaker information. Also have the option to disable transcribing a meeting or portions of it.
3. Please note that all detailed reports can be viewed only within the Lightbulb application by authorised users


To sign up - visit us at www.thelightbulb.ai
